message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. If you buy it, you'll get a premium product that will meet your expectations. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and I'm not sure when I'll be able to offer you another high-quality product like this one. What do you say?
